header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Food, cooking, food wastage, our grandparents’ house, TV series, arranged marriages, dowries, careers advice in schools, work experience, ‘closed’ industries, private industries, plastic bag charge, robots, industrialization, urban farming initiatives, furniture in the house, decorating
header.activity: Brother and sister sharing a meal and discussing every topics such as food

speaker.fls: Spanish -- level unspecified; Japanese -- level unspecified
